CONTACT US

Bath - Small99's People, Planet, Pint™: Sustainability Meetup

4 September 2025 – 4 September 2025

Small99 Pocock's Room @ The Grapes, The Grapes, 14 Westgate St, Bath BA1 1EQ, UK

Pop down to your local People Planet Pint meetup to find more about what's going on locally with sustainability and how you can get involved

Pop down to your local

People Planet Pint

meetup to find more about what's going on locally with sustainability and how you can get involved.

No pitches, powerpoints or panels. Just People, Planet, Pint/s.

Your local meetup is a great place to start your journey or continue learning, and meet diverse people to chat about life and how we can sustain it. Every job is a climate job, so come along and learn about how you can take action, as well as what is going on locally.

We welcome everyone, regardless of their experience or background. People Planet Pint is a space where everyone can feel comfortable learning about sustainability and sharing their ideas.

Afterall, creating a sustainable future requires connected communities. And what better way to bring everyone together than over a drink?

Your Volunteer Hosts

Polly Chappell

works as a sustainability consultant in Bath, supporting a range of organisations to create and deliver aspirational sustainability and net zero strategies. After graduating with her Masters in Management and Sustainability at the University of Bath, she did not want to leave this beautiful city. She is passionate for sustainable living, nature, sports and wellbeing, and spends her spare time trail running, road cycling or open water swimming.

Steve Coates is a chartered engineer and programme manager. His personal interest is in how climate change and global security are intrinsically linked and whether you are working on a major government project, in the supply chain as a Small/Medium Enterprise or taking actions at home, we can all contribute to making the world a safer and more sustainable place to live. Steve lives in Newbridge, Bath, and spends his spare time dog walking, running and brewing his own craft beer.

Our Sponsor

KRYSTAL

are an award-winning, 100% renewably powered web hosting, with datacentres in the UK, US, & Europe. They are climate positive, and their approach centres on value, quality and transparency.

We are delighted to announce our partnership with Krystal (the UK's only B Corp web hosting/cloud provider), and welcome them on board as sponsors of the People, Planet, Pint events.

This means

the first 33 drinks

are on Krystal at every event, and has allowed us to invest and upscale the series to accelerate action on climate change.

Simon Blackler

is the founder of

KRYSTAL

, and Co-Founder of

MillionTreePledge

.

About Us

Small99

provides carbon reduction plans for micro and small businesses. With a simple measurement tool and practical actions broken down into 10 minute to-do lists, Small99 empowers the 99% of businesses to start on their sustainability journey, and win more customers while doing so.
